methods.name: Focus
methods.description: Sets focus on the widget element, if it can be focused and keyboardOperation=true

methods.name: OpenNumPadExt
methods.description: Opens the numeric keypad.

methods.name: setAdditionalStyle
methods.description:
Add an additional style to the widget element. The initial style will not be removed.
The additional style will not be removed, when the style of the widget is changed.
You can remove the additional style via removeAdditionalStyle.

methods.name: SetBackColorExt
methods.description: Sets the back color of the widget.

methods.name: setEditable
methods.description:
Sets the state of property «editable»
Used for «editable» binding; method is called exclusevely by the framework

methods.name: setEllipsis
methods.description: Sets if a text that is too long should be symbolized using ellipsis points.

methods.name: SetEnable
methods.description: Sets the state of property «enable»

methods.name: setFormat
methods.description: Sets the number format for the widget.

methods.name: setKeyboard
methods.description: Sets if the standard keyboard is used for entries.

methods.name: setLimitViolationPolicy
methods.description: Sets the behavior in case of a value range violation

methods.name: setMaxValue
methods.description: Sets the maximum permissible value for value binding.

methods.name: setMinValue
methods.description: Sets the minimum permissible value for value binding.

methods.name: setNode
methods.description: Sets value with unit for node binding.

methods.name: setNumPadStyle
methods.description: Sets reference to a customizable numeric pad style.

methods.name: setNumpadPosition
methods.description: Sets the position of the number pad, relative to the widget.

methods.name: setParentCoWiId
methods.description: Used to inherit parentCoWiId inside of compound widgets to inner widgets which are not projected, e.g. inner widgets of Login widget

methods.name: setReadonly
methods.description: Sets whether the widget is readonly or not.

methods.name: setShowUnit
methods.description: Sets whether the unit should be displayed.

methods.name: SetStyle
setSubmitOnChange
methods.description: Sets if changes, such as entry of a different value, should be submitted to the server immediately.

methods.name: setTabIndex
methods.description: Sets the state of property «tabIndex»

methods.name: setUnit
methods.description: Sets the unit format for the widget.

methods.name: setUnitAlign
methods.description: Sets the position of the unit.

methods.name: setUnitTextAlign
methods.description: Sets unitTextAlign

methods.name: setUnitWidth
methods.description: Sets the minimum width of the unit's area.

methods.name: setUseDigitGrouping
methods.description: Sets whether number grouping should take place.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Sets value which is displayed in the widget.

methods.name: SetVisible
methods.description: Sets the state of property «visible»

methods.name: ShowTooltip
SubmitChange
methods.description:
Send value to the server, if binding for this widget exists.
Usage of this method will only make sense, if submitOnChange=false, as otherwise changes are submitted automatically.

parameter.name: origin
parameter.description: id of widget that triggered this event

parameter.name: horizontalPos
parameter.description: horizontal position of click in pixel i.e '10px'

parameter.name: verticalPos
parameter.description: vertical position of click in pixel i.e '10px'

events.name: DisabledClick
events.description: Fired when disabled element is clicked on.

parameter.name: origin
parameter.description: id of widget that triggered this event

parameter.name: hasPermission
parameter.description: defines if the state is caused due to missing roles of the current user

parameter.name: horizontalPos
parameter.description: horizontal position of click in pixel i.e '10px'

parameter.name: verticalPos
parameter.description: vertical position of click in pixel i.e '10px'

events.name: EnableChanged
events.description: Fired when operability of the widget changes.

parameter.name: contentId
parameter.description: content id of the widget where the drag operation has ended

parameter.name: widgetId
parameter.description: id of the widget where the drag operation has ended

parameter.name: contentId
parameter.description: content id of the widget that has been entering the droppable widget

parameter.name: widgetId
parameter.description: id of the widget that has been entering the droppable widget

parameter.name: contentId
parameter.description: content id of the widget that has been leaving the droppable widget

parameter.name: widgetId
parameter.description: id of the widget that has been leaving the droppable widget

parameter.name: contentId
parameter.description: content id of the widget where the drag operation has been started

parameter.name: widgetId
parameter.description: id of the widget where the drag operation has been started

parameter.name: contentId
parameter.description: content id of the widget that has been dropped on the droppable widget

parameter.name: widgetId
parameter.description: id of the widget that has been dropped on the droppable widget

events.name: OnError
events.description: Fired when there is an error on the operation.

parameter.name: result
parameter.description: Number of error transmitted by the mapp component.

events.name: VisibleChanged
events.description: Fired when the visibility of the widget changes.

properties.name: draggable
properties.description: Make widget draggable.

properties.name: ellipsis
properties.description: If true, overflow of text is symbolized with an ellipsis.

properties.name: enable
properties.description: Initial option to enable widget.

properties.name: format
properties.description: NumberFormat for every measurement system.

properties.name: keyboard
properties.description: Determines if internal soft keyboard (=NumPad) should open

properties.name: limitViolationPolicy
properties.description: Controls behavior in case of a limit violation.

properties.name: maxValue
properties.description: Sets the maximum value for the input. If value node binding is used for the value, then this property is overriden by OPC UA max value.

properties.name: minValue
properties.description: Sets the minimum value for the input. If value node binding is used for the value, then this property is overriden by OPC UA min value.

properties.name: node
properties.description: Value with unit for node binding.

properties.name: numPadStyle
properties.description: Style for the NumPad which is configured in current visualization. References all styles of the brease NumPad and of all custom NumPads.

properties.name: numpadPosition
properties.description: Determines the position of the NumPad relative to the input field.

properties.name: permissionOperate
properties.description: restricts operability to users, which have given roles

properties.name: permissionView
properties.description: restricts visibility to users, which have given roles

properties.name: showUnit
properties.description: Determines if the unit should be displayed

properties.name: style
properties.description: reference to a style for this widget type

properties.name: submitOnChange
properties.description: Determines if changes, triggered by user input, should be sent immediately to the server.

properties.name: tabIndex
properties.description:
sets if a widget should have autofocus enabled (0), the order of the focus (>0),
or if autofocus should be disabled (-1)

properties.name: tooltip
properties.description: reference to a tooltip for a widget

properties.name: unit
properties.description: unit code for every measurement system

properties.name: unitAlign
properties.description: alignment of unit label; supported values ["left"/"right"]

properties.name: unitTextAlign
properties.description: Defines the position of the unitText.

properties.name: unitWidth
properties.description: Width of unit area.

properties.name: useDigitGrouping
properties.description: Determines if digit grouping should be used

properties.name: value
properties.description: Initial visible value of input field as a number

properties.name: visible
properties.description: change visibility

properties.name: maxHeight
properties.description: maximum outer height of widget

properties.name: minHeight
properties.description: minimum outer height of widget

properties.name: maxWidth
properties.description: maximum outer width of widget

properties.name: minWidth
properties.description: minimum outer width of widget

properties.name: zIndex
properties.description:
The zIndex property specifies the z-order of a widget and its childs.
When widgets overlap, z-order determines which one covers the other. A widget with a larger zIndex generally covers a widget with a lower one.
The zIndex must be unique within a content.

properties.name: left
properties.description: absolute position measured from left boundary of parent container

properties.name: top
properties.description: absolute position measured from top boundary of parent container

properties.name: height
properties.description: outer height of widget

properties.name: width
properties.description: outer width of widget

descriptions.de: Ermöglicht dem Benutzer einen numerischen Wert einzugeben
descriptions.en: Enables the user to enter a numeric value
